synopsis.text: Ward's neon-lit Kabukicho district, a vibrant yet chaotic area known for its red-light district, is home to a group of eccentric detectives led by the fastidious and rakugo-loving Sherlock Holmes. As the city's darkness hides behind its bright lights, the detectives are put to the test when the infamous serial killer, Jack the Ripper, begins a deadly crime spree. Among the detectives is John H. Watson, a university hospital employee who initially sought out Sherlock's help with a peculiar case. As Watson becomes more involved with the detective lifestyle, he begins to uncover the true nature of the chaotic city and the mystery behind his own case. With a mix of suspense and comedy, this indistinguishable drama unfolds in the heart of Kabukicho, where the detectives of Mrs. Hudson's tenement work to solve the bizarre murders plaguing the city.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
